GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.16.10
GSD.description:
ibmvnic: don't release napi in __ibmvnic_open()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.10 by commit e08cb9056fb2564d1f6bad789bdf79ab09bf2f81, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit ed651a10875f13135a5f59c1bae4d51b377b3925. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:
ibmvnic: don't release napi in __ibmvnic_open()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.10 by commit e08cb9056fb2564d1f6bad789bdf79ab09bf2f81, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit ed651a10875f13135a5f59c1bae4d51b377b3925. For more details please see the references link.
